title: luckperms插件mysql数据库ssl报错
author: 二哈大魔王
txt_content:
Fri Sep 28 14:34:03 CST 2018 WARN: Establishing SSL connection without server's identity verification is not recommended. According to MySQL 5.5.45+, 5.6.26+ and 5.7.6+ requirements SSL connection must be established by default if explicit option isn't set. For compliance with existing applications not using SSL the verifyServerCertificate property is set to 'false'. You need either to explicitly disable SSL by setting useSSL=false, or set useSSL=true and provide truststore for server certificate verification.

本身配置文件里面有带ssl的选项

    # You can also use this section to disable SSL connections, by setting:
    # useSSL: false


但是我去掉#依旧报错..别让我换插件删插件 数据库5.7版本也不能换 求解决方法

replies.author: dengyu
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 dengyu 于 2020-8-14 18:50 编辑 

您好，这是我下载插件的config.yml相关部分




QQ图片20200814184748.png (19.09 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-8-14 18:46 上传






文件里useSSL和verifyServerCertificate都在properties下面。
我觉得您可以看看插件自身的配置文件是否是这样，并且无论如何都推荐您试试这样做：
properties:
  useUnicode: true
  characterEncoding: utf8
  useSSL: false
  verifyServerCertificate: false复制代码

replies.author: 梦江南
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.txt_content:
梦江南 发表于 2020-8-14 06:34
改成useSSL: true
或者mysql配置里面禁止ssl默认连接
改成 false和true 都无用啊  mysql配置禁止ssl默认连接是怎么操作的?

replies.author: 二哈大魔王
replies.txt_content:

改成useSSL: true
或者mysql配置里面禁止ssl默认连接
这句话什么意思 没懂..为啥不编辑到一起

replies.txt_content: 请问能否给出设置useSSL=false后的报错以及配置文件关于mysql的部分呢

上面是去掉配置文件前面#号

下面这个是配置文件

    # This setting allows you to define extra properties for connections.
    #
    # By default, the following options are set to enable utf8 encoding. (you may need to remove
    # these if you are using PostgreSQL)
    #   useUnicode: true
    #   characterEncoding: utf8
    #
    # You can also use this section to disable SSL connections, by setting:
    # useSSL: false
     useSSL: false
    # verifyServerCertificate: false
    properties:
      useUnicode: true
      characterEncoding: utf8
复制代码

replies.author: dengyu
replies.txt_content: useSSL应该和properties对齐，看着useSSL前面应该是多空了一格，如果还有问题请继续追问

replies.author: 二哈大魔王
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 二哈大魔王 于 2020-8-14 18:27 编辑 
dengyu 发表于 2020-8-14 08:43
useSSL应该和properties对齐，看着useSSL前面应该是多空了一格，如果还有问题请继续追问 ...
如果对齐就是 最开始的ssl警告
useSSL选项 无论是false还是true 都是最开始的ssl警告

replies.author: dengyu
replies.txt_content:
# verifyServerCertificate: false的#去掉，也就是说两个都去掉，即：
    # This setting allows you to define extra properties for connections.
    #
    # By default, the following options are set to enable utf8 encoding. (you may need to remove
    # these if you are using PostgreSQL)
    #   useUnicode: true
    #   characterEncoding: utf8
    #
    # You can also use this section to disable SSL connections, by setting:
    # useSSL: false
    useSSL: false
    verifyServerCertificate: false
    properties:
      useUnicode: true
      characterEncoding: utf8
复制代码

replies.author: 二哈大魔王
replies.txt_content:
dengyu 发表于 2020-8-14 18:31
# verifyServerCertificate: false的#去掉，也就是说两个都去掉，即：
按照你给出的配置也试过了..还是最开始的ssl警告 下面是从我配置文件里复制出来的 这部分
    # This setting allows you to define extra properties for connections.
    #
    # By default, the following options are set to enable utf8 encoding. (you may need to remove
    # these if you are using PostgreSQL)
    #   useUnicode: true
    #   characterEncoding: utf8
    #
    # You can also use this section to disable SSL connections, by setting:
    useSSL: false
    verifyServerCertificate: false
    properties:
      useUnicode: true
      characterEncoding: utf8复制代码
